title: Cheers to the Class of 2020!
description:
What do you do when graduation is postponed indefinitely? If you’re the Class of 2020, you get creative. From principals going the extra mile to make sure their students get their diplomas, to parents who threw at home graduations, to students making their end-of-year ceremonies personal, these 2020 graduation celebrations are unlike any other.

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
